TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebPartRow

summary.span: 使用單一資料欄位，定義連接兩個伺服器控制項的提供者介面。

span.span: Defines a provider interface for connecting two server controls using a single field of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面被設計來搭配 Web 組件連接。This interface is designed to be used with Web Parts connections. 在 Web 組件連接中，兩個伺服器控制項位於區域與一個做為取用者的控制項和其他控制項當做提供者建立連接和共用資料。In a Web Parts connection, two server controls that reside in a zone establish a connection and share data, with one control acting as the consumer and the other control acting as a provider. 共用 Web 組件連接中的資料的機制是透過回呼方法提供給消費者的提供者介面執行個體。The mechanism for sharing data in a Web Parts connection is an interface instance, which the provider serves to the consumer by means of a callback method. 若要建立連接，消費者和提供者必須都使用相同的介面型別共用資料。To establish a connection, the consumer and provider must both work with the same interface type for sharing data. 如果取用者無法辨識傳送提供者的介面類型，則仍可透過轉換程式連接控制項 (物件)，會轉譯成的型別提供者所傳送的介面執行個體，取用者會辨識。If the consumer does not recognize the interface type sent by the provider, it is still possible to connect the controls by means of a transformer (a object) that translates the interface instance sent by the provider into a type that the consumer recognizes. 如需連線的詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件連接概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b)。For details on connections, see and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b). 介面是設定為標準的介面，建立根據資料列的連接之 Web 組件控制項所包含的提供者介面。The interface is a provider interface included with the Web Parts control set as a standard interface for creating connections based on a data row. 您也可以建立自訂的介面，以使用 Web 組件的連線，但許多資料驅動型 Web 應用程式中，它是用於建立通用的欄位為基礎的連線 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱介面)，資料表 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱介面），或從資料來源的資料列。You can also create custom interfaces to use with Web Parts connections, but in many data-driven Web applications, it is useful to create connections based on a common field (for details, see the interface), table (for details, see the interface), or row from the data source. 在典型的連線，控制做為提供者會實作介面，並提供給取用者在特殊的回呼方法的介面的執行個體。In a typical connection, a control acting as a provider would implement the interface and provide an instance of the interface to consumers in a special callback method. 例如，可能會實作提供者資料列對應到您的使用者資訊資料表中的使用者介面。For example, the provider might implement an interface for a row that corresponds to a user in your user information table. 另一個控制項做為取用者會定義特殊的方法，以接收介面執行個體，無法擷取使用者資料、 使用它來尋找該使用者帳戶的相關額外資訊然後顯示所有資訊與相關該頁面上的使用者。Another control acting as a consumer would define a special method to receive the interface instance, and could then extract the user data, use it to look up additional information about that user's accounts, and display all the information related to that user on the page. 介面有兩個公開的成員。The interface has two exposed members. 屬性會傳回資料列中所封裝的結構描述資訊物件。The property returns schema information about the data row encapsulated in a object. 方法宣告 （例如提供者的控制項） 實作者用來叫用回呼方法時，擷取介面執行個體的資料列資料的方法。The method declares a method that an implementer (such as a provider control) uses to retrieve the interface instance's row data when the callback method is invoked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用兩個控制項之間的靜態連接介面。The following code example demonstrates how to create a static connection between two controls using the interface. 程式碼範例包含三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 原始碼的兩個自訂會形成連線使用的控制項介面，做為提供者，而另一個做為取用者的其中一個控制項。Source code for two custom controls that can form a connection using the interface, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer. - 裝載控制項，並宣告靜態連接持續性格式的網頁。A Web page that hosts the controls and declares the static connection in persistence format. - 描述範例程式碼執行時，會發生什麼事。A description of what happens when the example code runs. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是兩個自訂控制項的原始程式碼。The first part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 第一個是程式碼的提供者，它會實作介面。First is the code for the provider, which implements the interface. 為了簡單起見，在範例中，提供者會建立具有一些資料，而不是連接到資料庫資料表。For simplicity in the example, the provider creates a table with some data rather than connecting to a database. `GetConnectionInterface`方法做為提供者的連接點，回呼方法，傳回給取用者的介面執行個體。The `GetConnectionInterface` method serves as the provider's connection point, the callback method that returns the interface instance to the consumer. 與取用者，它會擷取介面執行個體中名為其方法的提供者從`SetConnectionInterface`，這會標示`ConnectionConsumer`屬性。As for the consumer, it retrieves the interface instance from the provider in its method named `SetConnectionInterface`, which is marked with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute. 之後在擷取執行個體的介面，取用者，其`OnPreRender`方法，會呼叫實作提供者來擷取實際的資料，並將它寫入至網頁中的方法。After retrieving the instance of the interface, the consumer, in its `OnPreRender` method, calls the implementation of the method in the provider, to retrieve the actual data and write it to the page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/CS/IRowSamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/VB/IRowSamples.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是宣告靜態連接並裝載控制項的網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page that declares the static connection and hosts the controls. 在頁面頂端附近是`Register`宣告 App_Code 目錄中包含原始程式碼的命名空間指示詞。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive that declares the namespace of the source code contained in the App_Code directory. 連接使用宣告``項目。The connection is declared using an `` element. 消費者和提供者的自訂控制項中宣告``內的項目``元素，其需要能夠連接 (繼承自一個區域內，所以必須位於類別)。The custom consumer and provider controls are declared in a `` element within an `` element, which is required for them to be able to connect (they must reside within a zone that inherits from the class). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 載入瀏覽器中。Load the page in a browser. 取用者控制項會顯示來自提供者會透過執行個體的指定資料列所提供的資料介面。The consumer control displays the data provided from the specified row, which the provider makes available through an instance of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetRowData(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback callback) cil managed

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，包含接收資料之方法的位址。

span.span: A delegate that contains the address of a method that receives the data.

summary.span: 傳回資料列的資料，介面正在將此資料列用作兩個 控制項之間連接的基礎。

span.span: Returns the data for the row that is being used by the interface as the basis of a connection between two controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來擷取介面所傳遞的資料列資料值。Use this method to retrieve the data row values passed by the interface. 提供者會實作這個方法，並取用者叫用它在點取用者已準備好處理或轉譯資料時。The provider implements this method, and the consumer invokes it at the point when the consumer is ready to process or render data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示實作和使用方法。The following code example shows the implementation and use of the method. 完整的範例所示的類別概觀介面。The complete example is shown in the class overview for the interface. 提供者控制項實作方法，傳回資料表中的特定資料列的值。The provider control implements the method, returning the value of a particular row in the data table. 取用者可以控制呼叫方法在其`OnPreRender`方法，使資料的值可以寫入頁面。The consumer control calls the method in its `OnPreRender` method, so that the value of the data can be written to the page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/CS/IRowSamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/VB/IRowSamples.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Schema As PropertyDescriptorCollection

summary.span: 取得資料列的結構描述資訊，這個資料列是用於兩個 控制項之間共用資料。

span.span: Gets the schema information for a data row that is used to share data between two controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供資料的屬性資訊。This property provides property information for the data. 使用介面在連接中，取得物件所參考的屬性。Using the interface in a connection, you get a object, which is referenced by the property. 合約會指定該呼叫`Schema[n].GetValue(RowData)`傳回的值*n*個資料列中的之資料行。The contract specifies that calling `Schema[n].GetValue(RowData)` returns the value of the *n*th column in the row. 您必須使用屬性來取得資料列中的值。You need to use the property to get the values in the row. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示實作和使用屬性。The following code example shows the implementation and use of the property. 完整的範例所示的類別概觀介面。The complete example is shown in the class overview for the interface. 提供者控制項實作屬性。The provider control implements the property. 然後取用者控制，請在其`RenderContents`方法中，查詢屬性來擷取資料列的資訊，因為資料列資料寫入頁面。Then the consumer control, in its `RenderContents` method, queries the property to retrieve information about the row as it writes the row data to the page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/CS/IRowSamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/VB/IRowSamples.vb#2)]
